Value.description: Internal image editor. This allow a quick visualisation and edition images / icons. The most common formats are recognized (xpm, bmp, png, ...). The goal is not to replace specialized image editors. The goal is rather to provide a convenient way to create / edit / view icons for toolbars or menu. For more help, use the HELP button in the editor (open an image or use the command FILE->NEW->NEW IMAGE to open the editor)
